text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS #Covid19 says....... not #oneperson so we should know let stay home #socialdistance it won't keep long #fam everyone will be allowed to feel #free it just an #update on the #network let push in ours so they know what #Africa also need so we all move with it it #5G
